MemoryInfobox.description: 'The Athenian military|Athenian army's morale would crumble if the treasure used to pay the soldiers was stolen, and Sparta would be one step closer to victory over the Megaris|region.'

General_Description: '''The Athenian Treasure Trove''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra travelled to [[Fort Geraneia]] in an attempt to cripple [[Athens]]' economy in [[Megaris]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra made her way through Megaris to Fort Geraneia. Upon reaching the outskirts, she began to work her way into the Fort. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Fort Geraneia is formidable. This must be where the Athenians keep their war chest. I should use [[Ikaros]] to find what I need.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''That’s what I’m looking for.'' (Players have the option of freeing a bear to wreak havoc among the guards.)
Kassandra snuck her way inside the building housing the treasure. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I should get the treasure and leave quietly. The Athenian soldier's won't be so eager to fight when they don't get paid.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra looted the fort's nation treasure, crippling Athens' economy in the region.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''

*'''Kassandra:''' ''I should get the treasure and leave quietly. The Athenian soldier's won't be so eager to fight when they don't get paid.''
